name: brain-computer-compression
description: Toolkit for neural data compression in brain-computer interfaces. Node.js tooling for docs, dashboard, plugin system, FastAPI backend, plugin API endpoint integration, and real-time dashboard live metrics.
author: Kevin <contact@bci-compression.org>
